repairedDockerfile:
# MySQL Server with Apache and phpmyadmin
#
# VERSION               0.0.1

FROM     base
MAINTAINER Jonas Colmsj√∂ "jonas@gizur.com"


RUN apt-get update && apt-get install --no-install-recommends -y curl git wzdftpd && rm -rf /var/lib/apt/lists/*;

EXPOSE 20 21
CMD ["/usr/sbin/wzdftpd","-s"]
